item.description:
Lindsay and I are having another Darwin Day celebration at our place in Dracut. We'll mix-up the night with some food & drinks, good discussions, some short video clips, and maybe a few fun rounds of Evolution. It will be a pot luck affair. We'll have some food, drinks, and cake of course.

So, come join us in celebrating one of the most influential homo sapiens in homo sapien history. 
Please RSVP.

~Darrick & Lindsay~

 

P.S. Note this event is on February 11th. Actually, Darwin Day is on the 12th. On Saturday the 12th, the Greater Boston Humanists is hosting a special viewing of the film, The Ledge, a philosophical thriller about belief and its consequences by filmmaker Matthew Chapman. Chapman is Charles Darwin's great-great grandson. 

For more info go to the Meetup event page here.
http://www.meetup.com/GreaterBostonHumanists/events/16359599/

On Sunday the 13th, Chapman will also lead a discussion on the role of science in US public life. For more info go to the Meetup event page here.
http://www.meetup.com/GreaterBostonHumanists/events/16359673/
item.why: Darwin Day is upon us again. Let's celebrate!
item.name: Darwin Day Celebration 2011
